review_blob:
Interesting for a DIPA. Not very hop forward but interesting fruity notes. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Not what I would expect in a DIPA but its kind of different. More straight up IPA flavor - not hops forward as you would expect. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
beer_name: Rush River Double Bubble Imperial IPA

review_blob:
Very complex which can be good and bad. Good in that the flavor is amazing. Bad in that its high abv so you gotta think twice if you reach for the 2nd (or third!). Love it though. Double Trouble is still my favorite DIPA. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
